title: Survey Builder: Javascript Demo
author: David Wong
preface: This survey is build using Javascript. We use JS to generate a survey based on a JSON file.

This toy is built with:
-- Javascript, jQuery, Bootstrap, HTML5, CSS3.

Objectives:
Create a survey form with title, preface, sections, questions and points created from a JSON configuration file.

Tab through the options:
TAB through each option, using keys 1-to-0 to select the option.

Mobile Devices:
Use this form on a phone or tablet.

Persistent Storage:
Survey uses localStorage to save selections and text. Choose a few options and refresh the browser to check.

Bootstrap framework:
Using the basic furniture within Bootstrap.

Project Status:
Way Incomplete.
-- Front end currently being modified, adding support for extra response-options, including multiple-answer, textual radio buttons, variable size textarea.
-- Backend database needs creating.
-- Backend database web form and response overview to be created.
-- Bad JSON makes baby cry.
Thanks for taking part in the Survey-Builder Demo survey!
This form can be used in your browser on Desktop, Tablet or Mobile phone.
instructions: You can click on the number inputs or use the TAB key to shuffle through each question.
Reset the question by clicking on the RESET ANSWERS button
Answers are saved to your machine until you submit your answers. Start the survey now, finish later =)

points.point: Question asked?
Question asked?
